body.name: Headphone Stand Gaming Headset Holder Universal Aluminum Metal Headphone Holder Hanger with Aluminum Supporting Bar Flexible Headrest ABS Solid Base for All Headphone,Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 2 mins
features: 【EASY TO ASSEMBLE】Combi of three parts,Just clips 3 parts into a sleek headphone holder within 30 seconds, giving the perfect centre of gravity to keep the headset holder upright and you have a nice presentable headphone stand,fast to detach it when not in use, put it in your drawer, book shelf, etc., or bag when travelling, with TINY space taken only.

【STURDY】Aluminum alloy center pole of the headset stand is sturdy and slender; Rubber stabilizers underneath grip the surface and keep the whole stand sitting safely while holding your headphones; Soft and protective rubber at the top prevents any scratches or damage with its cushioning effect. High-grade ABS & TPU rubber Material, safe and durable.

【Soft TPU Pad Protection】The headset holder's pad works as a cushion to protect your headphone headband from deep crease even after long time hanging. Flexible headrest made with a flexble TPU rubber, headrest to form to your headphones;holder work with almost size headphones form small to large.

【Suitable for Most Headphones】: It fits most headphones with a headband width within 1.7 inch/4.5 cm and device height within 8.85 inch/22.5 cm such as Bluetooth Headphone, Active Noise Canceling Headphone, Gaming Headphone, Telephone Headset, Children Headphone and so on.
【WARRANTY】3 YEARS Warranty, If you have any problem or suggestion, please kindly contact us freely. Your satisfaction means all to us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product is super sleek and doesn’t take up a lot of space. Which I really like about it. Extremely easy to put together and is super sturdy for the price it is. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap but does the job
reviews.reviewText: Whish the stand was taller and the rubber rest gets stained easily by headphone leather, but at these prices, you can't really complain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks better and more sturdy in person…
reviews.reviewText: Cute earphone or headset holder that’s easy to assemble, sturdy, light weight, and most importantly usable. Turned out to be a great way to spend $10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I put this together within 3 seconds really easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and serves my needs
reviews.reviewText: Good color for my lighter feminine office. A good value purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality and Inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to just get a simple white headphone stand for my Anker headphones. This fit the bill. It fits together nicely, is sturdy and has a nice aesthetic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sleek look!
reviews.reviewText: It simple and sleek! I highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Simple and basic
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for something with a clean and simple design this is a good choice. Matches a bright and airy aesthetic. Only thing is there isn’t much weight to it, so it does get knocked over easily.
